      • addParameter

        public void addParameter(String name,
                int beginOffset,
                int endOffset,
                boolean toQuote,
                boolean escaped)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the parameter
        beginOffset - the begin offset of the parameter value inside the RPC content body
        endOffset - the ending offset of the parameter value inside the RPC content body
        toQuote - the parameter need to be quoted when used
        escaped - the parameter value should be escaped so it has to be unescaped before
